biotools.summary: A novel statistical modeling of transcriptional expression states in single-cell RNA-Seq data | This repository contains the R codes which could reproduce the results of "LTMG: A statistical model of transcriptional regulatory states in single cell RNA-Seq data" by Changlin Wan, Wennan Chang, Yu Zhang, Fenil Shah, Sha Cao, Melissa L. Fishel, Qin Ma, and Chi Zhang
